channel.title: agile on On Software Engineering
channel.description: Recent content in agile on On Software Engineering

item.title: Agile is dead by Pragmatic Dave Thomas
item.description: This video is about how original idea of “Agile” is different from what we’re usually doing on “agile” projects. And Dave, as one of the 17 who created the Manifesto for Agile Software Development, knows what he’s talking about.
